Class Compuerta

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • logica.Compuerta
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AND, LED, NAND, NOR, NOT, OR, Switch, XNOR, XOR

    public abstract class Compuerta
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
    Author:
    Chacón Campos Clase abstracta de las compuertas lógicas
